name: Japan Book High School Club Dating Simulator
name_original: Japan Book High School Club Dating Simulator
description:
OFFICIALLY THE LOWEST-RATED DDLC FANGAME OF ALL TIME!!!

ATTENTION: This is a JOKE GAME meant to parody all the bootleg games that spawned when Team Salvato made Doki Doki Literature Club. I'd recommend playing that first before playing this if you haven't, as it contains spoilers for the real game. 

hello my name is marla and welcome to my book club! you find many atractive girl here!

saori: the brite and hapy girl!!!!!

yui: the shy reculsive gril!!!!!!!

natuuki: the cute magan readering grirl!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

and me, marla, the prety grile! join today!
